system.Text:
**When the scene challenge tension clock or progress track is filled, or when events lead to the scene’s conclusion**, roll the challenge dice and compare to your progress.

On a **strong hit**, you achieve your objective unconditionally.

On a **weak hit**, you succeed, but not without cost. You must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}. Make this a minor cost relative to the scope of the scene.

On a **miss**, you fail or are undermined by a dire and costly turn of events. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

Trigger.Text: When the scene challenge tension clock or progress track is filled, or when events lead to the scene’s conclusion...

Weak Hit.Text: You succeed, but not without cost. You must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}. Make this a minor cost relative to the scope of the scene.

Miss.Text: You fail, or are undermined by a dramatic and costly turn of events. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}. Make it hurt.
